data.name: A Forgetful Loop
data.detailed_description:
"In this final moment, our hopes, fears and uncertainties come together in action.
We'd joke that there's no going back now, but that's really the point, isn't it?"

With those fateful words, you join the team of Hope Labs. A group of scientists & engineers, setting out to change the world.

Except, it all goes wrong. And now the team needs to band together, to fix the machine, to get back to normal, to before it all broke...



A Forgetful Loop is a time-based worker-placement puzzle game, where you need to weigh up which nodes are more important at a given moment; To get closer to the core, closer to the finish line!






"Jennifer, Isabel, whatever's happening with you, I'm sorry -"
"- but we've only got seconds until we loop again."
"If you remember this conversation... help us fix the machine!"
The loop restarts again.

data.short_description: A Forgetful Loop is a time-based worker-placement puzzle game, where you need to weigh up which nodes are more important at a given moment; To get closer to the core, closer to the finish line!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Anything from the past 6 years
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
